title: Login Issues - Can't Access Account
description: Customer is unable to log in to their account despite multiple password reset attempts.

title: Payment Failed - Card Declined Error
description: User reports that their card is being declined even though it works on other services.

title: App Crashing on Startup
description: Mobile app closes immediately after opening on Android version 13.

title: Email Notifications Not Sending
description: Customer is not receiving order confirmation or password reset emails.

title: Profile Picture Upload Failing
description: User attempted to upload multiple images but keeps receiving a file validation error.

title: Search Results Not Accurate
description: Search is returning unrelated results instead of the correct items.

title: Two-Factor Authentication Not Working
description: User is not receiving 2FA codes on their phone or email.

title: Slow Dashboard Loading
description: Dashboard takes nearly 15 seconds to load for multiple users.

title: Order Not Showing in History
description: Customer placed an order but it does not appear in their history.

title: Broken Layout on Mobile View
description: Navbar overlaps page content on smaller screens.

title: Unable to Change Password
description: Password update form shows 'invalid current password' even when correct.

title: Subscription Not Activating
description: User bought a yearly plan, but their account still shows as free.
